title: CSHA Clinical Frailty Scale (CFS)
desc: The CSHA Clinical Frailty Scale (CFS) measures frailty to predict survival or need for institutional care.

orgreference.text: Rockwood K, Theou O. Using the clinical frailty scale in allocating scarce health care resources. Can Geriatr J. 2020;23(3):210-215.

other_refer.text: Pulok MH, Theou O, van der Valk AM, Rockwood K. The role of illness acuity on the association between frailty and mortality in emergency department patients referred to internal medicine. Age and Ageing. 2020;49(6):1071-1079.
Rockwood K, Song X, Macknight C, et al. A global clinical measure of fitness and frailty in elderly people. CMAJ. 2005;173(5):489-95.
